name: PLYDRIDIE #LDJAM 41
description:
If you usually play on your phone while driving, this game is for you.

Control the car in a race against time while scoring points on FlappyBird.
Every point at FlappyBird gives you 10 seconds of the total time. Theme:

Driving and Playing are things that do not combine at all. "Flappy Bird" and "Project Cars" as well.

Controls:

W A S D - Car Control

MOUSE MOVEMENT - Moves the camera

LEFT CLICK - Flap the Chicken

Objective:

Reach the target without dying and before time runs out.

If you're going to drive, do not flap around! 

*Assets free used on game
